Title: Get the Rope
Writer: Jack Amiel, Michael Begler, Jack Amiel (created by), Michael Begler (created by)

Plot: A riot breaks out when a police officer is stabbed by a black man defending his wife. The employees of the Knickerbocker fight to protect the lives of blacks injured in the riots.
